newsitem.title: USA: Federated says Mar-Apr same-store fig in-line.
newsitem.headline: Federated says Mar-Apr same-store fig in-line.

text.p: Federated Department Stores Inc said Wednesday March-April same-store sales were up 2.6 percent, which is in line with its expectations.

The company said it is necessary to look at March-April together to get an accurate picture of its early spring performance. The company said unseasonably cold weather in some parts of the country negatively impacted the sales of warmer weather apparel in April, keeping the sales increase for the month at the lower end of what had been anticipated.
The company's comparable store sales increase for April was 6.2 percent.
